TraitDef.label: Altmer Scholarly Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Altmer comes from a long line of scholars and researchers, possessing enhanced intellectual capabilities and a natural drive for knowledge.

li.label: Academic Excellence
li.description: Born into the scholarly tradition of Summerset, this pawn excels in research and intellectual pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Altmer Magical Purist
TraitDef.description: This Altmer adheres to the ancient traditions of magical purity and superiority, believing in the inherent magical supremacy of their race.

li.label: Arcane Supremacy
li.description: Born with the belief in magical superiority, this pawn has enhanced magical abilities but disdains lesser forms of magic.

TraitDef.label: Crystal Tower Adept
TraitDef.description: This Altmer has studied at the legendary Crystal Tower, gaining unparalleled knowledge in the arcane arts and ancient wisdom.

li.label: Tower Wisdom
li.description: Educated at the Crystal Tower, this pawn possesses deep knowledge of magic, history, and advanced research techniques.

TraitDef.label: Altmer Noble Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Altmer comes from one of the ancient noble bloodlines of Summerset, possessing refined social skills and natural leadership abilities.

li.label: Aristocratic Bearing
li.description: Born into nobility, this pawn has natural social graces and leadership qualities, but may struggle with manual labor.

TraitDef.label: Sapiarch Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Altmer descends from the Sapiarchs, the ancient wise-rulers of Summerset, combining scholarly excellence with natural authority.

li.label: Ancient Wisdom
li.description: Descended from the Sapiarchs, this pawn combines supreme intellect with natural leadership and deep understanding of magic.

TraitDef.label: Altmer Artisan Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Altmer comes from a family of master craftsmen, specializing in creating works of unparalleled beauty and magical precision.

li.label: Perfectionist Craft
li.description: Born into a family of master artisans, this pawn creates works of exceptional beauty and quality.
